about_me: My interest in IT is the result of a passion that I have cultivated since I was young.
In my free time I play volleyball, an activity I've been doing for over 10 years.
This allowed me to develop a strong sense of team spirit and belonging to the group. I currently play for Monselice Volley '86 in the regional Serie C championship.

education.name: High school diploma
education.place: J. F. Kennedy Technical Institute, Monselice (PD)
education.description: 1st level specialization diploma in computer science and technology DS1.
